decision_conditions: The proposed rear roof extension, be reason of its design, excessive size and scale, would result a dominant, overbearing and visually harmful addition to the property, to the detriment of the character, appearance and design of the conservation area. The proposal therefore would fail to comply with the objectives of the Section 72 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policies HC1, D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), SPD4, Ealing Housing Design Guidance (2022) and Haven Green Conservation Area Character Management Plan (2008).
description: Single storey side/rear (wraparound) extension; first floor rear extensions incorporating Juliet balconies; rear roof extension; installation of one rooflight to flank elevation roofslope; alterations to flank elevation fenestrations involving removal of window with door; installation of rooflight to existing rear two storey extension;
